screen_desc: The screenshot shows the search function on the Walmart website accessed from a mobile device. At the top, there is a search bar where users can type in queries to search for items available at Walmart. Below the search bar, there is a list of previously searched terms such as "best rated 4k tvs," "cheap bikes," "shimano brake pads," and "nintendo switch," each with an 'x' icon that likely allows users to remove these terms from their search history. There is also a 'Cancel' button next to the search bar, indicating the user could cancel the search or clear the input field.

This action directly moves you closer to your goal of finding the best-rated 4K TVs on Walmart.
